name: BULLET (Luke Farrell)
description:
BULLET is an intense, reflex-driven game in which you navigate a bullet through 9 short, highly-replayable levels. Evade enemy fire as you fly your way around levels in this unique top-down game!

KEY FEATURES:

  • BE THE BULLET - Utilising a unique control scheme, drift and dash around levels to reach the end. Just like a bullet, you can't stop, so plan your turns carefully!
  • AVOID ENEMY FIRE - Each enemy follows a consistent, predictable firing pattern, allowing for enemy fire to be easily avoided. Most enemies act as an obstacle: either evade or charge into them!
  • MASTER EACH LEVEL - At the end of each level, you will be ranked depending on your speed and the amount of enemies you've taken out. Learn shortcuts and strategies to find the most efficient way to complete each level!
  • DIE AGAIN AND AGAIN - Enemies can be taken out quickly, but so can you. The bullet's speed can be changed at any time during gameplay, allowing you to learn a level at a slower speed before mastering it at the fastest.
